org.gvsig.rastertools.raw.tools
Class VRTFormatUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.gvsig.rastertools.raw.tools.VRTFormatUtils

public class VRTFormatUtils
extends java.lang.Object

This class has some utils to create a VRT file. It has methods to obtaint the VRT parameters that will be written in the file

Author:
Jorge Piera Llodrá (piera_jor@gva.es)

                                              int headerSize,

                                              int numBands,
                                              int width,
                                              int height)
It calculates the ImageOffSet parameter value.

Parameters:
dataSize - Type of each pixel
headerSize - Header file size
interLeaving - Type of interleaving
band - Band number
numBands - Number of bands
width - Image width
height - Image height
Returns:
ImageOffSet parameter value
